loans.use: to purchase five cases of Primus, three cases of Fanta, three cases of Mitsing, etc.

loans.name: Tchamié

texts.fr: Père 03 enfants dont 01 scolarisé, tchamié est un jeune homme de 27ans. Pour bien jouer son rôle de père de famille, il exerce comme activité génératrice de revenu de l’huile à moteur. Il manque de fonds pour augmenter son stock c’est pour cela, il sollicite de WAGES un premier crédit. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité et assurer l’épanouissement de la famille.
texts.en: Father to 3 children of whom 1 goes to school, Tchamié is a young 27 year old man. To fulfill his role as father, he generates income by selling motor oil. He lacks funds to increase his stock. Because of this, he is requesting a first loan from WAGES. He wants to reinvest in his business and ensure the self-fulfillment of his family.

loans.use: to buy motor oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy general foodstuffs to resell.

loans.name: Dénis

texts.fr: Informaticien de profession, mr denis âgé de 30ans a pour femme une revendeuse. En plus de sa formation, il vend des livres chrétiens à toutes personnes. Afin d’augmenter son stock, il demande un prêt à WAGES pour acheter de la marchandise. Avec les profits réalisés, il voudrait assurer le bien –être de la famille et rendre pérenne son activité.
texts.en: Computer scientist by profession, Denis is 30 years old and his wife is a reseller. In addition to his training, he sells Christian books to everyone. In order to increase his stock, he is requesting a loan from WAGES to buy merchandise. With the profits, he would like to ensure the well-being of his family and make his business sustainable.

loans.use: to buy books.

loans.name: Mahukpego Group

texts.fr: MAHUKPEGO est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Clémentine (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 37 ans et est mariée à un certain Clément. Le couple a deux enfants dont un est scolarisé et tous à leur charge. Clémentine et son mari vivent ensemble avec leurs enfants et assurent ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Clémentine n’a jamais été l’école. Il y a près de vingt ans que Clémentine mène comme activité la vente de divers produits à son domicile. Clémentine exerce cette activité passionnément, ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants. Clémentine s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle, Clémentine sollicite un quatrième crédit avec les autres membres du groupe MAHUKPEGO. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits. Les crédits antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
MAHUKPEGO is a group of three people, whose members live in the same neighborhood. The representative of the group, Clémentine (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 37 years old and is married to a certain Clément. 

The couple has two children of whom one goes to school and all are under their care. Clémentine and her husband live together with their children and take care of the different household responsibilities together. Clémentine never went to school.

For almost 20 years Clémentine has been managing a business selling diverse products from her home. Clémentine practices this business with passion, which allows her to meet her needs and those of her children. Clémentine gets her supplies in a market in Bénin. 

Seeking to satisfy her clientèle, Clémentine is requesting a fourth loan with the other members of the MAHUKPEGO group. This loan will help them to better respond to the demands of their clientèle and to make more profits. The previous loans were well repaid.

loans.use: to buy diverse products.

loans.name: Mahuena Sourou A Group

texts.fr: MAHUENA SOUROU A est un groupe de cinq personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante du groupe, Henriette Caritas Baï (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 50 ans et est une veuve. Henriette Caritas Baï est mère de deux enfants, qui ne sont plus à sa charge. Henriette Caritas Baï vit seule et assure seule ses différents besoins. Henriette Caritas Baï a très peu fréquenté l'école. Il y a une quinzaine d'année, Henriette Caritas Baï mène comme activité la vente de divers produits (savons, sacs, tissus, fournitures scolaires, etc.) par le système de distribution ; ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins. Henriette Caritas Baï s’approvisionne dans une ville du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle, Henriette Caritas Baï sollicite un quatrième crédit avec les autres membres du groupe MAHUENA SOUROU A. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits.
texts.en: Mahuena Sourou A is a group of five individuals living in the same neighborhood of Benin. The group’s representative, Henriette Caritas Bai (the one raising her hand in the photo) is 50 years old and a window. Henriette Caritas Bai has two children, who are self-supporting. She lives alone and provides for herself. Henriette Caritas Bai has had very little formal schooling.  For about 15 years, Henriette Carita Bai has been selling miscellaneous items (soap, bags, fabric, school supplies, etc) through a distribution system, which allows her to support herself. She stocks up in a town of Benin. With the goal of customer satisfaction, Henriette Caritas Bai, along with the other members of the Mahuena Sourou A group, is seeking a fourth loan. This loan will allow the group members to better meet  demand and  increase their profits.

loans.use: to buy boxes of soap, fabric, bags and school supplies.

loans.name: Sophorn

texts.en:
Sophorn is 31 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. Sophorn has been working in a garment factory for more than two years, earning approximately $5 daily. Her husband is a rice farmer who earns about $2 per day.

In order to improve her family’s finances, Sophorn is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase farmland for cultivating cassava. In the future, she would like to expand her farming business and help her children get their higher education. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase farmland for cultivating cassava

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en: Miriam, 52 years old, is married and has three children. She has operated a grocery for eight years and she also farms to generate more income. Through Faulu Kenya, Miriam has managed to grow her business. She has also been trained in financial management, which has helped her to handle her finances by saving. Miriam desires to open a wholesale grocery in the future. She needs a loan of 20,000 KES to increase her stock of sweet potatoes, potatoes and bananas.

loans.use: To increase her stock of sweet potatoes, potatoes and bananas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy water tanks and pipes for irrigation

loans.name: Cristofer Francisco

texts.es: El joven Cristofer de 21 años de edad empezó a laborar a los 18, su actual empleo es de educación de adultos con 12 horas laborales a la semana, es estudiante de la carrera de licenciatura de psicología clínica, ha costeado sus estudios con el apoyo de sus padres y el de el propio, pero no es lo suficiente para poder cubrir el costo de un solo el curso de titulación, es por eso que acude a solicitar crédito para poder pagar su curso ya que de lo contrario tendría que esperar hasta el próximo año, su carrera es muy importante para el por qué le gusta ayudar a las personas, escucharlas y entenderlas. Cristofer agradece mucho el apoyo que le brinden ya que con esto les están permitiendo a jóvenes de bajos recursos a realizarse.
texts.en: Young Cristofer, 21, started to work at the age of 18.  He currently works in adult education for about 12 hours weekly.  He’s also a a Bachelor's Degree student majoring in clinical psychology.  He’s paid for his studies himself and with help from his parents but it’s not sufficient to cover a single final course which is why he’s asking for a loan to pay for this course.  Otherwise, he’ll have to wait until next year.  His career is very important to him because he likes helping people, to listen to them and understand them.  Cristofer is very grateful for the support provided because you are helping young people of limited resources to fulfill their dreams.

loans.use: to pay for his final course.

loans.name: Rodolfo Antonio

texts.es: Rodolfo Antonio vive junto a sus padres, el posee un cibercafé y una fotocopiadora, tiene varios años de poseer el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias,  esta ubicado en un lugar muy estratégico cerca de una escuela,  los estudiantes son sus mejores clientes, todas las personas lo prefieren por los buenos precios, y por la calidad del buen servicio, Rodolfo es un  hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, y con muchas ganas de salir adelante día a día busca las mejores alternativas le den la oportunidad de llegar al éxito, en estos últimos meses han aumentado los clientes y como todo buen comerciante quiere extender el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión en mejoras de activos, pero para ello necesita de capital por eso le solicito a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar repuestas de computadora y mantenimiento del lugar. Rodolfo Antonio tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la confianza que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Rodolfo Antonio lives with his parents.  He has an Internet access café and a photocopier.  He’s had the business for several years and he’s gained much experience that makes it possible for him to earn higher profits.  He’s located in a very strategic spot near a school; the students are his best customers.  Everyone prefers him because of his good prices and for the quality of his good service.  

Rodolfo is an enterprising man who is dedicated to his work and who very much wants to get ahead.  Every day he seeks better alternatives that will provide opportunities for him to reach success.  In recent months his clientele has grown and like any good merchant he wants to expand the business and invest in new assets.  But to do so he needs capital which is why he’s asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy computer spare parts and for maintenance of the site.  Rodolfo Antonio has good payment references and impeccable morals.  He’s sure to repay the loan and at the same time trusts that he will provide his family with a fulfilled life.

loans.use: to buy computer spare parts and for service.

loans.name: Yim

texts.en:
Yim (in the photo) raises pigs and produces rice wine. She is now a widow because her husband just passed away. She has five daughters; three are married. Yim lives in a suburb of Phnom Penh.

She is applying for a loan of $1,000 to buy pig feed; this will assist her pig farming business.

loans.use: to buy pig feed to assist her pig farming business.

loans.name: Douglas Antonio

texts.es: El joven Douglas de 22 años de edad estudiante de la carrera de licenciatura en contaduría pública y finanzas, labora para una empresa privada como auxiliar contable, salario que no le da para cubrir su curso de titulación ya que este es su último año como estudiante universitario, el solicita apoyo de crédito para cubrir con el costo del título, de no ser posible este préstamo tendría que atrasarse un año para poder ahorrar para el pago de su curso; su profesión es muy importante para el por que se irá desarrollando como un profesional y podrá ayudar a las personas que lo necesiten.
texts.en: Young Douglas, 22, is a Bachelor’s Degree student majoring in public accounting and finance.  He’s employed in a private firm as an accounting aide.  His salary is insufficient to cover costs for his final course; he’s in his final year of university.  He’s looking for support from a loan to cover the cost of this course.  If the loan were not possible, he’ll be delayed a year while he saves up enough to pay for the course.  His profession is very important to him because he will develop as a professional and will be able to help people who need him.

loans.use: to pay for his final course.

loans.name: Srey Touch

texts.en:
Srey Touch is 38 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating rice and selling groceries for more than ten years, earning approximately $2 daily. Her husband is a construction foreman. He earns about $10 each day. 

In order to improve her husband’s business, Srey Touch is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase construction materials for her husband to build a flat for his client. This money will help him have enough materials for the construction. 

In the future, she would like to expand the business and send her children to earn higher education.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for her husband to build a flat for his client.

loans.name: Ernest

texts.en: Ernest, who is a farmer, used his previous loan to buy more chicks for his farm.  The chicks matured and later produced eggs from which he made good profits; he used the additional income to buy chicks' mash. Ernest has requested another loan of 35,000 KES to buy more chicks and animal feeds.

loans.use: to buy chicks.

loans.name: Mbodze

texts.en:
Mbodze, 45, lives with her life partner and six children. She earns a living through the door-to-door sale of dumplings to the neighbors.  She’s been in business for five years, and has acquired much experience that leads her to earn higher profits. She has quite a few regular customers because people know that everything she sells is of top quality and at affordable prices; in addition, her service is excellent.

Mbodze is an enterprising woman who has many future goals. She wants to earn a better living and is working hard to do so because she knows that’s the only way to reach success. 

Like all good merchants, she wants to increase business but needs capital to back her up. This is why she’s asking Yehu for a loan to buy ingredients like wheat flour, cooking oil, baking powder, etc. 

She’s confident that she’ll be able to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like wheat flour, cooking oil, baking powder, etc to make dumplings for resale.

loans.name: Consolata

texts.en:
Consolata sells fish, and has been in her business for the past four years with very good income.

This is her second term loan with KADET LTD.  She paid her previous loan well, and in good time.  She will use this loan amount to purchase more stock of fish for resale.

She hopes to own a permanent structure to do her business.

loans.use: to add more stock of fish for resale.

loans.name: Fausto Edgardo

texts.es: Fausto Edgardo de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo; Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro y eso le ha regalado experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas; el terreno de cultivo esta ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a la localidad donde reside, comercia en todos los alrededores de la localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere porque todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad, a precios accesible y con un excelente servicio; Fausto es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, siempre esta buscando alternativas que le permitan encontrar el camino para un futuro mas prospero sabe que solo así alcanzara el éxito, en la ultima temporada de siembra tuvo algunas perdidas y quiere recuperarse, realizara una nueva inversión y para ello le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, insecticida, herbicida, etc. Fausto Edgardo tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Fausto Edgardo, 43, lives with his life companion and their son.  He grows corn and beans and has worked in this occupation for several years which has provided him with valuable experience that makes it possible for him to obtain the best harvests.  His farmland is located in an area with high agricultural activity that’s very near to where he lives.  He sells in all surrounding areas and has a large clientele that prefers him because everything he sells is top quality, prices are affordable and service is excellent.

Fausto is an enterprising man who is dedicated to his work.  He’s always looking for alternatives that will make it possible for him to find the road towards a more prosperous future; he knows this is the only way to attain success.  

He experienced some losses in the previous growing season and wants to recuperate.  He will make a new investment and needs a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticide, herbicide, etc. to do so.  Fausto Edgardo has good payment references and is sure that he will be able to repay the loan while trusting that he will be able to provide economic security for his home.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticide and herbicide.

loans.name: Elizabeth De Los Angeles

texts.es: Elizabeth de 39 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y tres hijos muy alegres y dedicados a sus estudios. Elizabeth trabaja como costurera en su casa de habitación elaborando ropa para hombres mujeres y niños, mucha de esta ropa se hace por encargos previos pero también ella elabora trajes, faldas y otros más para comercializar y de esta forma obtener ganancias extras. Elizabeth solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder comprar telas en diferentes colores, con distintos estampados y estilos para elaborar más prendas de vestir, sobre todo para esta temporada de fin de año que se acerca, para poder estar muy equipada con ropa para ofrecer a las personas.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, 39, lives with her husband and three very cheerful children who are dedicated to their studies.  Elizabeth works as a seamstress at home making clothes for men, women and children.  Much of the work she does is to order but she also makes suits, skirts and others to sell and earn extra money this way.

Elizabeth is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to be able to buy fabric in assorted colors with various prints and styles to make more articles of clothing, especially for this upcoming end-of-year season so that she can be well-stocked with clothes to sell to people.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Francisca Guadalupe

texts.es: Francisca de 31 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y un hijo de 4 años de edad. Ella siempre ha sido una madre muy responsable quien se esfuerza mucho para salir adelante. Francisca se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y productos para el cuidado de la piel, un negocio que ha sido muy positivo para ella ya que así pueda brindarle la ayuda necesaria a su esposo con todos los gastos de su hogar. Francisca solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar cosméticos, cremas para el cabello y el cuerpo y el cabello, esmaltes, perfumes y otros más. Lo que ella desea es aumentar sus ventas y de esta forma contar con una mejor economía en su hogar.
texts.en: Francisca is 31 years old and lives with her husband and 4 year-old son. She has always been a very responsible mother who works very hard to get ahead. Francisca devotes herself to selling cosmetics and skin care products, a line of business that has turned out to be very positive for her, as well as being able to provide the necessary assistance to her husband with all the household expenses.  Francisca requests a loan from INTEGRAL, through which she will buy cosmetics, creams and lotions for body and hair, nail polish, perfume and more. What she seeks is to increase her sales and thus create a better economic situation at home.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials for building a cereal store.

loans.name: Ligaya

texts.en:
This is Ligaya, a 43-year-old resident of Bacoor, Cavite City, Philippines who is married to Jovencio and a mother to her children. She and her husband manage their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Ligaya operates a market stall selling fruits and vegetable products by the kilo in the community market. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community, and she earns a minimum of Php 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 50,000 loan to buy more quantities of fruits and vegetables to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business.

Ligaya dreams of giving a good quality education to her children, and hopes to have a good future through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for vegetables and other products needed in her business.

loans.name: Jenniffer Auricela

texts.es: Jennifer de 21 años de edad, es una joven ejemplar, alegre y trabajadora, se dedica a estudiar derecho en la universidad. Vive únicamente junto a su abuela y para salir adelante se dedican a la venta de edredones y cubrecamas los cuales comercializan en parques, oficinas y diferentes pueblos. Jennifer cuenta con grandes deseos de superarse por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder comprar más variedad de ropa de cama ya que su negocio ha ido creciendo al igual que la demanda, el mayor deseo de Jennifer en surtir su negocio y ganar más para seguir pagando sus estudios y así mismo contar con todo lo necesario en su hogar.
texts.en: Jennifer, 21, is an exemplary young woman; she’s cheerful and hardworking.  She is studying law in the university.  She lives just with her grandmother and in order to get ahead they sell comforters and bedspreads in parks, offices and various towns.  Jennifer very much wants to improve which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy a wider variety of bed linens because her business has been growing as well as demand and Jennifer’s greatest wish is to stock her business and earn more to be able to continue paying for her studies as well as having everything needed at home.

loans.use: to buy bedspreads to sell.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa de 61 años de edad, es una señora muy responsable y puntual, vive junto a su esposo quien se dedica a trabajar. Teresa posee una venta de tortillas en su casa de habitación en donde también vende pupusas y bebidas frías y calientes. Con el deseo de aumentar sus ventas para bien de su hogar y su economía ella solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar toda la materia prima por mayor, ya que de esta manera podrá obtenerla a precios más bajos lo que le garantizará mayores ganancias.  Teresa es una persona que goza de muchas referencias positivas ya que siempre se esfuerza por salir adelante.
texts.en: Teresa, 61, is a very responsible, punctual lady.  She lives with her husband who works.  Teresa sells tortillas at home and also sells pupusas [filled, grilled corncakes] and hot and cold beverages.  Wanting to increase sales for her home’s wellbeing and economy, she’s requesting a loan to buy all the raw materials at wholesale so that she can get them at lower prices thus insuring higher profits.  Teresa is a person with very positive references because she always strives to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make pupusas.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
This is Emma. She previously accessed a 20,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education, and in their personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages, and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help to sustain her family’s daily needs and her children’s education expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Emma hopes to grow her business in the coming years and dreams to be able to give her children a good and high quality education through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Annastacia

texts.en:
Annastacia is a thirty-eight-year-old farmer in Nkubu County, Kenya. She is widowed, and lives with three of her children, all of whom are in school. She has been farming for seven years, producing milk, and growing fruits and vegetables, which she sells at the local market.  Annastacia is employed, which helps her get an additional source of income.

She is requesting 40,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase dairy goats.  This will help her get more income, and will be of great help to her since she will be able to pay school fees for her children. She aspires to buy an extra piece of land that will help her increase her produce in the future.

Unreliable weather conditions, pests and diseases are her major challenges.

Annastacia says Juhudi Kilimo is doing a great job with small-scale farmers.

loans.use: to buy dairy goats to produce milk to sell.

loans.name: Andrian

texts.en:
Andrian is a 40-year-old farmer from Nkubu County in Kenya, where he lives with his wife and three children, of whom two are schooling. He has been in farming for the past fifteen years, producing bananas and fruits which he supplies to a board. He also operates a hotel as an additional source of living.

He is requesting 42,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow, which will help him get extra income that will help him educate his children. He aspires to open a cereal shop in the future.

Pests, diseases, and crop failure are some of the challenges Andrian faces.

Andrian says Juhudi Kilimo is the best microfinance institution for small-scale farmers.

loans.use: to buy and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Carlos Alfredo

texts.es: Carlos Alfredo de veintidós años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su madre, él se dedica a la venta de juguetes carritos, rompecabezas, muñecos, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y tiene mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener buenas ganancias, comercia de forma ambulante y también le vende a diferentes locales de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela fija que lo prefiere porque todo lo que comercia es de calidad y a precios accesibles además de un excelente servicio; Carlos es un hombre dedicado a su labor, muy activo y luchador siempre esta en la búsqueda de oportunidades que le permitan encontrar el camino al éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar juguetes por mayor. Carlos Alfredo tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, se hace responsable de cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá darle a su familia una vida mejor y más completa.
texts.en:
Carlos Alfredo, 22, lives with his life companion and his mother.  He sells toys: cars, jigsaw puzzles and dolls, among others.  He’s been in business several years and has much sales experience that allows him to earn good profits.  He sells from place to place and also sells to various locales in the community.  He has quite a few regular customers who prefer him because everything he sells is quality at affordable prices and service is excellent.

Carlos is a man who is dedicated to his work; he’s very active and tenacious and is always looking for opportunities that will allow him to find the road to success.  In recent weeks, demand has increased and he wants to take advantage of it and make a new investment but lacks sufficient capital which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy toys at wholesale.  Carlos Alfredo has good payment references and impeccable morals.  He commits to repay the loan while trusting that he will be able to give his family a better, more complete life.

loans.use: to buy toys at wholesale.

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en:
Rehema is from the town of Tiribe. She is 35 years old, and is a married mother to three children. She lives in her own home. She has a business selling seasonal fruits and vegetables in a small stall in her home. She sells a variety of fruits and vegetables such as tomatoes, onions, cabbages, bananas, etc. She comments that her work requires a lot of sacrifice, because she has to be there the whole day. Her goal is to have her children become good and well-educated people so that they will not have to suffer the hardships that she experienced.

She approached Yehu to ask for a small loan that will help her to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell. She is grateful to Yehu and to Kiva for the great assistance that they are providing as this loan is going to be a big help to her.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 35 years old and a mixed crop farmer. She is married to Timothy a business man. They are blessed with four children. She has been in the farming business for the past twelve years with a monthly income of KES. 10,000 which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her second loan term from KADET LTD after repaying the previous loan successfully. Mary will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm. 

With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and build rental houses.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm.

loans.name: Mbeyu

texts.en:
Mbeyu is from the rural area of Tiribe. She is married and has 8 children who are in school.

Mbeyu has a small grocery store. Her sales are increasing and giving her a good income. With the help of her husband and her whole family, she is getting ahead in life with a lot of sacrifice and hard work. Mbeyu is now a successful micro-businesswoman, and she has a loyal and large customer base as a result of her kindness.

She has shown herself to be a responsible and honest person in regards to her obligations so we may give her all the support she needs. She is requesting a loan to buy food products, drinks, dairy products and other items she needs so that she can continue to work and grow her business.

loans.use: To buy food products, drinks, dairy products, and other items

loans.name: Ejidio

texts.en: Ejidio is 58 years old, married and has six children.  He farms both plants and fish, and has employed two people in his business.  He has been farming for 14 years.  After joining Faulu Kenya, he got some capital and also started dairy farming. His desire is to practice large-scale farming in the future. Ejiodio needs a loan of 20,000 KES to buy farm fertilizer and fishing nets.

loans.use: To buy farm fertilizer and fishing nets

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel de Jesús de cuarenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus seis hijos, él se dedica a la producción de calzado para damas, caballeros y niños tiene muchos años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda y es un lugar muy concurrido de personas, toda su producción la comercia en diferentes locales y también por pedidos ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque el calzado es de calidad, a buenos precios, con buen estilo, pero sobre todo con un excelente servicio; Manuel es un hombre trabajador, muy activo y con muchas metas que desea alcanzar día a día se esfuerza al máximo, es muy constante en sus objetivos pues sabe que solo así logrará el éxito, como todo buen comerciante quiere continuar con su producción para así obtener ganancias, pero la falta de materia prima lo ha limitado por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cuereo, pegamento, hebillas, suelas, cintas, etc. Manuel tiene buenas referencias de pago es responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Manuel de Jesús, 48, lives with his life companion and their six children.  He works manufacturing shoes for women, men and children.  He’s been in business many years and has gained much experience which allows him to earn the best profits.  The business is located at home and it’s a very busy place that many people visit.  He sells all his production in various locations and also on order.  He already has many customers because people prefer him because his footwear is good quality at affordable prices, well styled and above all with excellent service.

Manuel is a hardworking, very active man who has many goals to reach.  He strives to the maximum degree every day and is very constant with his objectives because he knows this is the way to attain success.  Like all good merchants, he wants to continue producing in order to earn profits but the lack of raw materials has limited him and this is why he decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan to buy leather, glue, buckles, soles, shoelaces, etc.  Manuel has good payment references; he’s responsible and assures that he will be able to repay the loan while he has faith that he will give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy leather, glue, buckles, soles and shoelaces.

loans.name: An

texts.en:
An is 39 years old. She is married, and resides with four children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been working as chefs for more than ten years, earning approximately $6 daily. Additionally, her husband works construction when he is free. 

Her children are employed in a garment factory; they earn about $10 each day.

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, An is requesting a loan of $900 to purchase materials for running a catering business for wedding ceremonies and other parties. In doing so, she would earn more income for the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house to provide better living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase materials for preparing food for wedding ceremonies and other parties.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en: Eva is from Labo, Ozamiz City. She is 42 years old. Eva is married and has 4 children. To make a living Eva has owned and operated a general store for 8 years and earns 6,000 a month from these activities. In 2010, Eva joined GDMPC. Eva is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to purchase new items such as candies, milo (malted milk), shampoo, soaps, etc. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, milo (malted milk), shampoo, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Wendy Elizabeth

texts.es: Wendy Elizabeth de veintidós años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida, su hijo y su madre, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras fresas,  limones, tomates, plátanos entre otros, tiene varios años de poseer el pequeño negocio y se ha hecho de experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener muy buenas ganancias, comercia desde un puesto en su vivienda ya tiene mucha clientela fija pues la localidad es muy concurrida de personas, todos la prefieren porque todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y además con un servicio inigualable; Wendy es una mujer activa, dedicada a su labor y muy luchadora, siempre esta buscando conseguir sus sueños, todos los días se esfuerza por encontrar nuevas oportunidades que le den el éxito y no piensa rendirse hasta alcanzarlo; como toda buena comerciante quiere ampliar su venta pero para ello necesita realizar una nueva inversión y no posee de capital que la respalde por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar frutas y verduras por mayor. Wendy Elizabeth tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Wendy Elizabeth, 22, lives with her life companion, their son and her mother.  She works selling fruit and vegetables like strawberries, lemons, tomatoes and bananas, among others.  She’s had this small business for several years and has gained much sales experience that allows her to earn very good profits.  She sells from her stand at home and has a lot of regular customers because her location is well-known by many people.  Everyone prefers her because everything she sells is top quality at affordable prices and service is always unequalled.

Wendy is an active woman who is tenacious and dedicated to her work; she’s always seeking to make her dreams reality.  She strives daily to find new opportunities for success and does not plan to give up until she reaches it.

Like any good merchant she wants to expand her sales but needs to make a new investment to do so and does not have capital to back her up which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy fruit and vegetables at wholesale.  Wendy Elizabeth has good payment references and is very responsible; she’s sure that she will repay the loan while at the same time is confident that she’ll provide a better life for her family.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables at wholesale.

loans.name: Letty

texts.en:
Letty is from Poblacion 3, Clarin. She is 39 years old, married, and has 4 children. For the past 5 years she  she has been raising and selling pigs to make a living, and earns 4,000 PHP a month. 

In 2010, Letty joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of 5,500 PHP which will be used to purchase livestock feed & other supplies. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed & other supplies

loans.name: Ana Rosario

texts.es: Ana Rosario de cincuenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida José y sus hijos; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, esta ubicada en el lugar de su residencia en una localidad muy transitada, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, las personas la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes; Ana es una mujer dedicada a su labor, enérgica y con muchas metas por delante, su mas grande secreto para alcanzar el éxito es la constancia y el amor al trabajo sabe que solo así logrará lo que desea, como toda buena comerciante quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, huevos, pan, bebidas, etc. Ana Rosario tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana Rosario, 54, lives with her life companion, José, and their children.  She has a store where she sells basic staples, beans, milk, eggs and bread, among others.  She’s had the business for many years and has gained sales experience that allows her to earn the best profits.  The store is located at home in a location with many passersby.  She’s acquired a large clientele.  People prefer her because she always meets their needs with top quality goods at affordable prices with unequalled service; she’s always at her customers’ disposal.

Ana is a woman who is very dedicated to her work; she’s energetic and has many goals in front of her.  Her greatest secret to reach success is constancy and love of work; she knows that this is the only way to attain what she wants.  Like all good merchants, she wants to expand the business and make a new investment but needs capital to do so which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy basic grains, snacks, eggs, bread, beverages, etc.  Ana Rosario has good payment references and is sure to repay the loan while she’s confident to provide her family with better quality of life too.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
This is Erlinda. She previously accessed an 8,000 PHP loan that she used to buy more vegetables and cooking products. Her earnings were a big help in their personal, household and business expenditures.
 
She would like to apply for another loan for 28,000 PHP to purchase more vegetables and cooking products needed in her business. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Erlinda dreams of giving all her children a good and high-quality education and of building her house in her province. Every week, she faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional vegetables and cooking products needed for her business.

loans.name: Elsa Dinora

texts.es: Elsa Dinora de veinticuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de quesadillas por mayor tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en la producción, el negocio esta ubicado en su residencia, con ayuda de su esposo comercian por diferentes mercados y colonias pues ya tiene mucha clientela fija pues la prefieren porque vende un producto exquisito, de calidad a un buen precio y además con un excelente servicio; Elsa es una mujer dedicada a su labor, emprendedora y con muchos sueños por delante, dia a dia se esfuerza al máximo porque sabe que así alcanzara el éxito, con el ultimo financiamiento Elsa lograr acrecentar su negocio y ahora que aumento la demanda quiere aprovechar y realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima huevos, leche, harina, utensilios etc. Elsa Dinora tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elsa Dinora, 24, lives with her life companion and their son.  She sells quesadillas at wholesale and has been in business several years.  She’s gained much production experience.  The business is located at home and with help from her husband she sells in various markets and neighborhoods because she has a large, regular clientele that prefer her for her delicious, top quality product at affordable prices with excellent service.

Elsa is a woman who is dedicated to her work; she’s enterprising and has many dreams ahead of her.  Day to day she strives to the maximum degree because she knows that this is the way to attain success.

With this loan Elsa will be able to expand business and now that demand has increased Elsa wants to take advantage of it and make a new investment but not having the capital to do so has led her to request a loan from INTEGRAL to buy raw materials like eggs, milk, flour, utensils, etc.  Elsa Dinora has good payment references and she assures that she will be able to repay the loan while providing better quality of life for her family at the same time.

loans.use: to buy eggs, milk, flour and utensils.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en: Elsa is a 55-year old resident of Labo, Ozamis City. She provides for her 3 children from the small income of PHP 5,000 she earns monthly from her piggery business. She has been running this business for 5 years in order to supplement the income her husband earns. Since 2007 she's been a member of GDMPC, and has applied for a loan of PHP 3,000 to buy feeding supplies. Elsa wants to expand her business one day.

loans.use: to buy feeding supplies.

loans.name: Philip

texts.en: For the past nine years Philip has been in the mixed crop farming business. He has had good harvests, and earns a monthly income of 5,000 KES. He was introduced to KADET LTD by a staff member, and this is his second loan from the organization. He will use the money to purchase seedlings and fertilizers for use on his farm. He hopes to purchase a larger plot of land for farming.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings and fertilizers for use on his farm.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is 32 years old. She is married to Kamau and together they have three children. She operates a retail shop whereby she sells a variety of household items like buckets, jugs, thermoses, mugs, etc. She has been in this business for the past two years and earns a good income.

After being introduced to KADET LTD by a friend who is also a registered client of KADET, she is applying for her first loan of KES 10,000, which she intends to use to buy more stock of household goods like mugs, jugs, and buckets for sale. 

She hopes to improve the living standards of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of household goods like mugs, jugs, and buckets.

loans.name: Katy Lorena

texts.es: Katy Lorena de veintisiete años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida José, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de perfumes, tiene varios años de trabajar en este negocio y tiene mucha experiencia en su fabricación, comercia desde su hogar y es muy conocida por las personas del lugar y e ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque elabora las fragancias con un olor inigualable, con producto de calidad, a precios accesibles pero sobre todo con un excelente servicio; Katy es una mujer activa muy dedicada a su labor, se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad y su gran motivación por salir adelante, le gusta luchar por lo que desea y esta dispuesta a trabajar duro hasta lograr el éxito, no piensa rendirse; en los últimos meses aumento la demanda y para no perder a su clientela necesita aumentar la producción y no posee de capital para la inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima materiales naturales como frascos, agua desmineralizada, alcohol, rosas, cascara de limón, naranjas, etc. Katy Lorena tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Katy Lorena, 27, lives with her life companion, José.  She works manufacturing and selling perfume.  She’s been in this business for several years and has much experience manufacturing.  She sells from home and is very well-known by local people and she’s acquired a large clientele because people prefer her because she manufactures fragrances with an unequalled scent made from top quality ingredients at affordable prices and with excellent service.

Katy is a very active woman who is dedicated to her work.  She’s noted for her great kindness and her strong drive to get ahead.  She likes to strive for what she wants and is willing to work hard to attain success; she does not intend to give up.

Demand has increased in recent months and in order not to lose customers she needs to increase production but lacks investment capital to do so which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy natural raw materials like jars, demineralized water, alcohol, roses, lemon zest, oranges, etc.  Katy Lorena has good payment references and is very responsible; she assures that she will repay the loan while trusting that she will provide economic security for her home.

loans.use: to buy jars, demineralized water, alcohol, roses, lemon zest and oranges.

loans.name: Arlindo

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos, todos frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta dois sobrinhos que vivem com ele.
É electricista de profissão e com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, pedra e outros) para ampliar a sua casa. 
No futuro deseja tirar carta de condução e apostar nos estudos dos filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é encontrar novo mercado para a sua profissão para poder aumentar a sua renda mensal.
texts.en:
Arlindo is married and the father of four children, all of whom attend school. He lives in his own house with his family and provides for two nephews who live with him.

He makes a living as an electrician and with this loan he intends to buy construction materials (cement, sand, stone and others) to enlarge his house.

In the future he wishes to get his driver's licence and to invest in his children's studies. For this, he is committing to paying the loan in order to request more from Hluvuku. 

The challenge for him is to find a new market for his profession, so he can increase his monthly income.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, sand, stone and others) to enlarge his house.

loans.name: Ana Marisol

texts.es: Ana Marisol de treinta y siete años de edad vive junto a su hija de quince años que aun estudia; ella se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa interior y calzado, tiene seis años de trabajar en el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia de forma  ambulante por todos los alrededores de la comunidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por los buenos precios, el producto de calidad y sobre todo por el buen servicio; Ana es una mujer enérgica, dedicada a su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante todos los días pone su mayor esfuerzo porque sabe que solo así alcanzara el éxito, como toda buena comerciante ahora que aumento la demanda, quiere realizar una nueva inversión y extender el negocio pero para ello necesita de capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa interior y calzado por mayor. Ana Marisol tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la confianza que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Ana Marisol is 36 years old. She lives with her daughter who is 15 years old and is still studying. She makes a living buying and re-selling undergarments and shoes. She has been working in this business for the last 6 years and as a result of all of her experience she has been able to improve her income. She sells by walking around her town, to all areas of the community. She has a good customer base, due to her good prices, quality products and good customer service. Ana is an energetic woman with a strong desire to get ahead. Everyday she puts forth 100% of her effort because she knows that that is the only way she will be successful. As it is with all good salespeople, now her demand has increased and she wants to invest in the business to expand it, but in order to do so needs capital. That is why she has requested a loan through INTEGRAL, so that she can buy undergarments and shoes at wholesale. Ana Marisol has good credit references and is very responsible. She has insured that she will be able to pay back the loan and is confident that at the same time she will be able to give to her family a fuller life.

loans.use: to buy undergarments and shoes at wholesale.

loans.name: Novie

texts.en:
This is Novie. She previously accessed a 12,000 PHP loan, which she used to purchase a greater quantity and variety of grocery items needed for her business. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education, and in meeting the family’s personal, household and business expenses. 

Novie would like to apply for another 10,000 PHP loan in order to buy more groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in higher profits. The income from this business will definitely help to meet her family’s daily needs and her children’s education expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.  
	
Novie hopes to be able to expand soon, just as she dreams of being able to give her family a good future through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her work and draw strength and inspiration from her studies of the Word of God.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro finance loans.

loans.use: to buy more groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory.

loans.name: Rosa Elida

texts.es: Rosa Elida vive junto a su compañero de vida Melvin, ella se dedica a la venta de pescado y adicional a esto para complementar los gastos del hogar vende zapatos y perfumes, tiene varios años con el negocio y tiene mucha experiencia en las ventas por lo que siempre obtiene muy buenas ganancias, comercia desde su hogar y de forma ambulante y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren por el producto de calidad y los buenos precios además del excelente servicio; Rosa es una mujer emprendedora muy dedicada a su labor, siempre esta buscando alternativas para alcanzar el éxito y su mas grande secreto es la constancia y el amor a su trabajo, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar este momento para una nueva inversión pero no posee de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pescado, perfumes, y calzado. Rosa Elida tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía en que le ofrecerá a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa Elida lives with her life companion, Melvin.  She works selling fish and in order to contribute more to family income she also sells shoes and perfume.  She has been in business several years and has much sales experience so she always earns good profits.  She sells from home and also from place to place and she has a large clientele because people prefer her top quality products, the affordable prices and the excellent service.

Rosa is an enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work.  She’s always seeking alternatives to attain success and her greatest secret is constancy and love of work.  Demand has increased in recent weeks and she wants to take advantage of the moment to make a new investment but lacks capital which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy fish, perfume and footwear.  Rosa elide has good payment references and is very responsible; she assures that she will repay the loan while at the same time trusts that she will provide better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy fish, perfume and footwear.

loans.name: Sandra Maritza

texts.es: Sandra de 29 años de edad, es una mujer muy trabajadora y responsable quien vive junto a su esposo. Ella trabaja como empleada doméstica, y así mismo se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, cuenta con muy buenas referencias ya que es muy honrada. Sandra solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para construir un cuarto en su hogar en donde puedan tener una habitación cómoda junto a su esposo ya que en la actualidad no se encuentra dividida de la sala, por lo que es muy importante para Sandra y su esposo poder construir su habitación, con dicho préstamo invertirán en la compra de ladrillos, cemento, arena y pintura. Con esto ella junto a su compañero de esperan vivir más cómodos al  contar con la intimidad de un dormitorio.
texts.en:
Sandra is 29 years old and lives with her husband. She is a very hardworking and responsible woman. She is employed as a domestic worker doing housework and has good references because she is very honest.

Sandra is requesting a loan from Integral, which will provide the money necessary to add a room to her house. She will use the room as a comfortable bedroom for herself and her husband since they currently sleep in part of the living room.  Consequently, it is very important for Sandra and her husband to be able to build a bedroom. The loan will be used to buy bricks, cement, sand and paint. Thus, she and her partner hope to live more comfortably when they have privacy in their new sleeping quarters.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Josyline

texts.en:
Josyline is 31 years old, married, and has two children.  To earn a living, she sells bananas.  She has been in the business for ten years and has employed three people.  She works hard in her business so as to provide for her family.  

Through Faulu Kenya, she has been able to access business loans easily. She has also learned how to save her money. Josyline hopes to become more financially stable in the future. 

She needs a loan of 20,000 KES to add stock of bananas.

loans.use: to add stock of bananas.

loans.name: Marina De Los Angeles

texts.es: Marina de los Ángeles de sesenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras en el mercado de la localidad donde reside, ya tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de experiencia valiosa en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, en la comunidad es muy conocida y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad a precios accesibles además de un servicio inigualable; Marina es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan encontrar el camino a un futuro mas prospero, no piensa rendirse hasta alcanzar el éxito; en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda de su producto y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tomates, chiles, cebollas, plátanos, fresas, etc. Marina tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marina de los Ángeles is 72 years old and lives with her life companion and her son. She sells fruits and vegetables at the market in the community where she resides. She has had her business for several years and has accumulated valuable sales experience which enables her to earn the best profits. She is very well known in the community and has a wide clientele since people prefer her because she always has what they need and her products are high quality and reasonably priceed. She also provides unequaled service.

Marina is a very enterprising woman, who is dedicated to her work. She is always looking for new opportunities which will lead to a more prosperous future. She doesn’t plan to give up until she achieves success.

In recent weeks, demand for her products has increased and she wants to take advantage of it to make a new investment in her business. Thus, she is requesting a loan from Integral that will enable her to purchase tomatoes, hot peppers, onions, bananas, strawberries, etc. Marina has a good credit history and an irreproachable character. She is sure she will be able to pay back the loan and she is also confident that it will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, hot peppers, onions, bananas, strawberries.

loans.name: Elio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos, ainda não frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Técnico agrário de profissão e com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas de zinco, cimento, barrotes, areia, pedra e outros) para ampliar a sua casa. 
No futuro deseja tirar carta de condução uma vez que no seu serviço esta a ser cobrado, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é possuir uma carta de condução.
texts.en:
He's married and has two children who don't go to school yet. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doens't support anyone else.
He works as an agricultural technician. With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, cement, beams, sand, rocks, etc.) in order to enlarge his house.
In the future he wishes to get his driver's license, because his employer has been requiring him to do so. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is getting a driver's license.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, cement, beams, sand, rocks, etc.) in order to enlarge his house.

loans.name: Hans Enrique

texts.es: Hans de 26 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y un pequeño hijo de tres años de edad, él es un padre muy responsable y trabajador quien se esfuerza a diario por llevar el sustento diario a su hogar. Hans posee una venta de llantas nuevas y usas y también repuestos básicos para la reparación de automóviles, su negocio ha crecido mucho en los últimos meses gracias a un préstamo otorgado anteriormente, debido a esto sus clientes han incrementado por lo que quiere solicitar un préstamo más para comprar mayor cantidad de llantas y de esta manera seguir creciendo como lo ha hecho hasta ahora gracias al apoyo de INTEGRAL.
texts.en: Hans, 26 years old, lives with his wife and young 3 year-old son. He is a very responsible and hardworking father who works every day to provide food on the table. He has a business selling new and used tires and also basic spare parts to repair cars. His business has grown greatly in recent months thanks to a loan he received previously. Due to that, his customers  have increased and he now wants to request a new loan in order to purchase a larger quantity of tires. Thus he will continue expanding as he has been doing until now, thanks to the help from Integral,

loans.use: to purchase tires to re-sell.

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 2 filhos, 1 ainda frequenta Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Comerciante e dona do seu negócio. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar mercadoria (capulanas, lençóis, cortinas, mantas e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja obter um espaço dentro do mercado para construir uma banca, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos suficientes para realizar seus projectos.
texts.en:
She's single and has two children, one of whom still attends school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She's in retail and owns her own business. With this loan she intends to purchase merchandise (skirts, sheets, curtains, blankets, etc.) in order to stock up her business.
In the future she wishes to acquire a space inside the market so that she can build a sales booth. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is not having enough funds to implement her projects.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for selling (skirts, sheets, curtains, blankets, etc.).

loans.name: Maria Elizabeth

texts.es: María trabaja muy duro por contar con todo lo necesario para vivir, ella posee una tienda de productos perecederos y de primera necesidad como: pollo, leche, pan y otros más. María vive sola y no recibe ningún tipo de ayuda de nadie por lo que desea mucho poder incrementar la cantidad de productos y de esta forma vivir mejor. Ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, y así contar con el dinero necesario para poder comprar todos los productos necesario para que las ventas aumenten lo que es muy importante para ella, ya que solo así podrá vivir mejor.
texts.en:
María works very hard to have everything she needs to live. She has a store with perishable products and staples such as chicken, milk, bread, and more. María lives alone and doesn't receive any kind of help from anyone, so she really wants to be able to increase the amount of products and thus to live better.

She is requesting a loan to INTEGRAL, and thus she will have enough money to buy all the products necessary to increase sales, what it's very important for her, because only then she will live better.

loans.use: to buy perishable products.

loans.name: Gerito

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos, 2 ainda frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta uma sobrinha que vive com ele.
É polícia e quadro do Ministério do Interior. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, chapas, barrotes, areia e outros) para fazer acabamentos na ampliação da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja obter um espaço dentro do mercado para construir uma banca, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos suficientes para realizar seus projectos.
texts.en:
He's married and has four children, two of whom still attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports a niece who lives with him.
He's a police officer and a staffer of the Ministry of the Interior. With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, sheets, beams, sand, etc.) in order to finish the addition to his house.
In the future he wishes to acquire a space inside the market so that he can build a sales booth. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is not having enough funds to implement his projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, sheets, beams, sand, etc.) in order to finish the addition to his house.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos, de 21 años de edad, es estudiante de Ingeniería Industrial en la Universidad.
Juan Carlos  decidió estudiar esta carrera por que siempre ha tenido interés por manejar equipos industriales, su carrera dura 5 años y actualmente cursa el tercer año, a sus estudios le dedica 07 horas diarias, por otro lado en sus ratos libres labora como diseñador mecánico, ingreso que le sirve para algunos gastos como pasajes y libros. Juan Carlos quiere terminar su carrera y especializarse en gerencia de proyectos para minería algo muy requerido debido al desarrollo minero en el Perú, con el dinero de su préstamo podrá solventar sus capacitaciones y cursos extracurriculares, así podrá seguir estudiando sin tener que preocuparse por esos pagos, su mayor sueño para el futuro es formar su propia empresa de metal mecánica. El está agradecido a todos los inversionistas que hacen posible su préstamo para que jóvenes como él sigan luchando por alcanzar sus sueños.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos, 21 is an industrial engineering student in the university.  He decided to study this career because he’s always been interested in managing industrial equipment.  The course of study is five years and he’s currently in the third year.  He spends 7 hours daily in his studies and in his free time works as a mechanical designer earning income that helps him with some expenses like transportation and textbooks.  

Juan Carlos wants to finish his career and specialize in mining project management which is highly needed for Peru’s mining development.  He will use the money from the loan to cover his training costs and extracurricular courses so that he can continue studying and not be concerned about those payments.  

His greatest dream for the future is to form his own metal mechanics firm. He’s grateful to all the lenders that make loans for young people like him possible so they can continue striving toward reaching their dreams.

loans.use: to pay for his courses and training.

loans.name: Los Innovadores Group

texts.es:
La señora María Del Pilar es miembro del grupo Los Innovadores, grupo que está emprendiendo su cuarto ciclo, la mayoría de socias son amigas del barrio. Maria es conviviente y tiene 02 hijos, se dedica  a la venta de productos de belleza empezó en este negocio como ayudante de una amiga, así fue aprendiendo  hasta lograr hacerlo por su propia cuenta, actualmente le dedica a este trabajo 5 horas diarias, por las tardes sale en busca de nuevos clientes; los productos que más vende son cosméticos, perfumes y joyas. lo  que más le agrada de su trabajo es poder relacionarse con diferentes personas, de otro lado gracias a sus ingresos puede ayudar  a su familia, sobre todo a sus hijos con los gastos escolares, lo que más ansia es convertirse en consultora de belleza; su actual préstamo le permitirá adquirir productos de belleza en oferta para luego venderlos. María Del Pilar quiere tener un lugar estable donde poder mostrar sus productos, para eso le gustaría alquilar un local en algún mercado, espera lograrlo muy pronto.
¡María Del Pilar agradece el apoyo!

*Maria Del Pilar viste chaleco azul y polo blanco.
texts.en:
María Del Pilar is a member of the “Los Innovadores” (The Innovators) group.  This group is in its fourth cycle.  Most of the members are friends from the neighborhood.  María Del Pilar is one of the group members.  She has a spouse and two children.  She works selling beauty products; she started in this business as an assistant to a girlfriend and this is how she gradually learned it and eventually started to work for herself.  She currently spends five hours daily at work.  In the afternoon she goes out looking for new customers.  What she sells most are cosmetics, perfume and jewelry.  What she enjoys most about her work is being able to relate to different people and on the other hand to be able to help her family with the money she earns, especially help with her children’s schooling costs.  What she most wants is to become a beauty consultant.  The current loan will make it possible for her to buy acquire beauty products that are on special promotion to subsequently resell.  María Del Pilar wants to have a stable place to display her products and to do so would like to rent a space in some market; she hopes to do so soon.  María Del Pilar is grateful for the support.
*María Del Pilar is wearing a blue vest and white shirt.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Julio C. Tello Al Progreso Group

texts.es: Esta es la Alcancía Comunal “Julio C. Tello al Progreso” la cual está conformado por 10 mujeres emprendedoras que  en el trascurso del tiempo  han  demostrado responsabilidad. En esta oportunidad conocerán a la señora Magnate de 25 años, casada con 01 niño aún dependiente. Con los deseos de contar con un negocio propio y al ver que los ingresos de su pareja no alcanzaban para cubrir los gastos del hogar Magnate decide emprender su propio negocio, la cual hace casi 01 año se dedica a la venta de golosinas, también nos manifiesta brinda servicio de costura obteniendo un ingreso extra para su hogar. Posteriormente piensa instalar otro kiosco en un lugar céntrico. Su último crédito lo destinará para la compra de golosinas como galletas, caramelos, chocolates, bebidas y así tener surtida su kiosco. Magnate se encuentra sentada es la primera del lado derecho tiene casaca negra y la vemos con su niño.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Julio C. Tello al Progreso”, is made up of 10 women entrepreneurs that in the course of time have demonstrated responsibility. This time, you will meet our member Magnate, 25 years old, with one child still a dependent. With the desire to have her own business and seeing that her partner’s income was not enough to cover home expenses, Magnate decided to undertake her own business, which for almost one year has sold candies. Also, thanks to a sewing service she is making extra income for her home. Subsequently, she is thinking about installing another kiosk in a central location. 

She will use her last loan to buying sweets like cookies, candies, chocolates, and drinks, and therefore stock her kiosk. Magnate is seated first on the right. She has a black jacket and we see her with her child.

loans.use: to purchase cookies

loans.name: Jennifer Yanira

texts.es: Jennifer de 24 años de edad, es una mujer muy trabajadora quien vive con su madre y cuatro hijos menores de edad, ella es madre soltera por lo que debe esforzarse mucho para brindarles todo lo necesario a sus hijos. Jennifer se dedica a la comercialización de aritos, peines, colas para el cabellos, blusas, ropa interior y otros artículos más, su puesto esta ubicado a las afueras del mercado del lugar, por lo que cuenta con varios clientes que transitan el lugar, siendo esta zona muy concurrida y de mucho comercio, lo que lo convierte en una posición estratégica para ella. Jennifer solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad y variedad de ropa femenina y así mismo le gustaría incluir sandalias y cosméticos de forma que sus ganancias vayan incrementando.
texts.en:
Jennifer is 24 years old, is a hard-working woman, and lives with her mother and four minor children. She is a single mother, so she has to strive to provide all the necessary for her children. Jennifer is dedicated to sell earrings, combs, hair bands, blouses, underwear, and other articles. Her stall is located at the outskirts of the city's market, so she has several clients that pass the place, because it's a busy area with a lot of businesses. That means it's a strategic location for her.

Jennifer is requesting a loan to INTEGRAL, so she can buy larger quantities and variety of women's apparel. Also, she would like to include sandals and cosmetics so her profits will increase.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora Alicia de 36 años de edad, es una persona muy alegre y agradecida con Dios por tener una familia unida y trabajadora, la cual esta conformada por su esposo y dos hijos gemelos de 17 años de edad quienes estudian. Dora posee una tienda en la que vende productos alimenticios, para la limpieza del hogar, detergentes para la ropa, golosinas y otros más, debido a que en la zona que reside hay más tiendas, existe bastante competencia por lo que desea mejorar sus servicios equipando mejor el negocio, razón principal por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder comprar mayor cantidad de productos como sodas, jugos, huevos, granos básico entre otros. También Dora desea comprar una plancha (cocina de gas) para elaborar tortillas y de esta forma aumentar sus posibilidades de obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Dora Alicia is 36 years old and is a very happy person and grateful to God for giving her a hard-working and close family.  Her family is comprised of her husband and two twin boys, 17 years old, who are students.  Dora owns a store in which she sells food products, house-cleaning products, detergents for clothes, candies, and other things.  Since there are other stores in the area where she lives, there is great competition, and for that reason she wants to improve her services and better equip the business.  That is why she is asking for a loan from Kiva partner INTEGRAL, in order to purchase a larger quantity of products like sodas, juices, eggs, basic grains and other items.  Also Dora wants to buy a griddle (she cooks over a gas stove) in order to make tortillas and in that way be able to increase her options and obtain better income.

loans.use: To purchase basic food and household products.

loans.name: San Judas Tadeo Group

texts.es:
¡Buenas tardes! Esta es Jasmin, una joven de 24 años que pertenece al la alcancía comunal “San Judas Tadeo”.

Jasmin es casada y tiene un hijito de 4 años. Esta es la primera vez que saca un préstamo con Edaprospo y por eso está muy emocionada.

Jasmin se dedica a la preparación y venta de comida desde hace 4 meses. En su puesto de comida sirve almuerzos (una sopa y el segundo plato), gaseosas y otra comida, que cocina en casa. Su puesto tiene un pequeño salón donde se sientan los clientes, por ejemplo vecinos y personas que trabajan en una fábrica cercana.

Con el préstamo Jasmin quiere invertir en su negocio y planea comprar comida al por mayor, platos, cubiertos y pintar la pared del salón.

Aparte su negocio, Jasmin es la cantante principal en una orquestra que toca cumbia, merengue, y otros ritmos locales. Todos aquellos que tuvieran la oportunidad de escucharla están de acuerdo que Jasmin tiene una voz encantadora. Su mayor sueño es seguir practicando y lograr ser una mejor cantante. 

Jasmin es la chica en el centro de la segunda fila, que habla en el video. ¡Jasmin agradece el apoyo brindado!
texts.en:
Good Afternoon!  This is Jasmin, a young woman of 24 years, who belongs to the communal bank "San Judas Tadeo."

Jasmin is married and has a 4 year-old child.  This is the first time that she has taken a loan from EDAPROSPO, and because of this she is very excited.

Jasmin has had a business preparing and selling food for 4 months.  At her eatery she serves lunches (a soup and a second dish), soft drinks, and other food that she cooks in her house.  At her place of business she has a small room where her customers can sit; they are mainly neighbors and people who work in a nearby factory.

With this loan, Jasmin wants to invest in her business.  She plans to buy food at wholesale, plates, covers, and paint for the walls of her eatery.

In addition to her business, Jasmin is the main singer in an orchestra that plays cumbia, merengue and other types of Peruvian music.  Everyone who has had the opportunity to hear her perform agrees that Jasmin has an amazing voice.  Her main dream is to continue to practice so that she can become a better singer.

Jasmin is the girl at the center of the second row who speaks in the video.  Jasmin appreciates the support that is being provided to her!

video.title: Kiva Borrower RICARDINA GUILLERMINA  from Peru

loans.use: to buy food at wholesale, plates, covers, and paint for the walls of her eatery
